summary: SummaryNARS Total Seduction Eyeshadow Stick is a cream eyeshadow stick that delivers high-impact color with an all-day, crease-resistant matte finish. Create limitless eye looks that stay in place for up to 16 hours.
details: DetailsBenefitsMatte shades glide on instant, high-impact color before locking in a transfer-proof finish, while reflective shimmers build and blend without fallout or fadingFlexible cream allows for enough playtime to layer color with cream or powder eyeshadowsCrease- and water-resistant formula stays in place for up to 16 hoursFeaturesAll-day crease-resistantUp to 16 hour wearWater-resistantOphthalmologist tested; non-irritatingItem 2624150How To UseApply directly to the eye and blend out color with fingertips.Layer on cream or powder eyeshadow to intensify color.On light to medium skin tones, apply ADULTS ONLY or DON'T TOUCH all over the eyelid. Blend out the edge with fingertips up toward the crease to ensure a smooth transition.On medium-deep to deep skin tones, apply OBLIVION all over the eyelid. Blend out the edge with fingertips up toward the crease to ensure a smooth transition.For a smoky look, use deep shades to draw along the lashline, and blend out with NARS #25 Smudge Brush (sold separately).IngredientsDimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Lauroyl Lysine, Silica, Polyethylene, Synthetic Wax, Mica, Stearoxymethicone/Dimethicone Copolymer, Caprylyl Methicone, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Cera Carnauba/Cire De Carnauba, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Polysilicone-11, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Dicalcium Phosphate, [+/-(May Contain/Peut Contenir): Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)].Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply directly to the eye and blend out color with fingertips.Layer on cream or powder eyeshadow to intensify color.On light to medium skin tones, apply ADULTS ONLY or DON'T TOUCH all over the eyelid. Blend out the edge with fingertips up toward the crease to ensure a smooth transition.On medium-deep to deep skin tones, apply OBLIVION all over the eyelid. Blend out the edge with fingertips up toward the crease to ensure a smooth transition.For a smoky look, use deep shades to draw along the lashline, and blend out with NARS #25 Smudge Brush (sold separately).
ingredients: Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Cera Carnauba/Cire De Carnauba

reviews.headline: Fabulous
reviews.comments: This is so rich and creamy. The color stays on, but blends very well with other colors to build.

reviews.headline: Mattes are amazing, shimmers not so much.
reviews.comments: I own a lot of shadow sticks from different brands. I have this in 3 shades: Don't Touch (matte), Oblivion (matte), and Orgasm (shimmer). The mattes are absolutely amazing. Opaque, creamy, blendable, beautiful colors. Probably my favorite mattes I've ever used. The shimmer leaves a lot to be desired. Sheerer than I expected, harder to blend, and just generally underwhelming. Stick with Bobbi Brown or Laura Mercier for your shimmers, but the mattes are worth every penny.

reviews.headline: Awesome eye shadow
reviews.comments: Im trying to up my make up game at 40 from tinted foundation and this eye shadow is easy to add to my routine. I love the colors and how easy it is to apply. Will be back for more colors.

reviews.headline: Love the Nars eyeshadow sticks!
reviews.comments: I have been obsessed with eyeshadow sticks and have tried so many including Bobbi Brown, It Cosmetics, and Nars. Nars is by far my absolute favorite. Color glides on very easily and doesn't dry as quickly so there's time for blending. No eye tugging. I can't wait to buy more.

reviews.headline: Good product! Bad cap
reviews.comments: I ordered this color in Don't Touch because I was specifically looking for a purply/brown color that would look almost natural on my eyelids. I love the color and the formula--I can put the stick on directly to my lid and then just blend out the edges really quickly with a brush, and the look is exactly what I want. However the cap is cracking, and I've only had this product for a month. I've only stored it upright in my makeup bag, haven't traveled with it or given it any opportunity to bounce around. I can't fully close the lid now, so I'll probably have to depot it at some point, which will change the application experience. I don't know if I will repurchase, which is such a bummer because I was so stoked to have found this shade.

reviews.headline: Very pretty & subtle shade
reviews.comments: This goes on smooth and is very pretty and long lasting.

reviews.headline: Best eyeshadow stick I've used
reviews.comments:
Im blown away by the quality of these eyeshadow sticks. They go on in a very thin layer, no chunky or uneven bits. I can use my fingers or a brush to blend it out and every time it looks great. They are buildable and have enough drying time to let you work with them without becoming sloppy. They lst all day on my eyes, and I'm prone to eyeshadow fading very quickly. 

I own dont touch and oblivian. I wish they had a lighter ivory shade to round out the color spectrum. Ive swatched the darker shades in store and they are gorgeous too. I may pick up another to use as an eyeliner.

reviews.headline: Favorite stick eyeshadow
reviews.comments: Smooth, creamy, natural matte formula. Good for mature lids.

media.headline: Smooth, long-lasting eyeshadow stick!
media.caption: NARS Living Sin Taupe shimmer color swatch

faceoff_positive.comments:
The Total Seduction Eyeshadow Stick by NARS is a luxurious and versatile product that stands out for its ease of use, pigmentation, and long-lasting formula. With its creamy texture, the eyeshadow stick glides effortlessly across the eyelids, providing a smooth application without any tugging. The highly pigmented formula ensures vibrant color payoff with just one swipe, making it suitable for both subtle daytime looks and bold, dramatic evening styles. Additionally, the product is buildable and blendable, allowing users to customize their look with ease, whether they prefer a soft, diffused appearance or a more intense finish. However, it sets quickly, so blending needs to be done promptly.

One of the standout features of this eyeshadow stick is its longevity. Once applied, it stays put for hours without creasing or smudging, making it a reliable choice for long days or special occasions. The compact, twist-up design is travel-friendly, eliminating the need for bulky palettes or extra brushes. NARS also offers a stunning range of shades, catering to a variety of skin tones and preferences, from neutral everyday hues to bold jewel tones.

That said, the product does come with a few drawbacks. Its premium price point may feel like a splurge compared to other eyeshadow sticks on the market, though the quality often justifies the cost. Additionally, the stick format can limit precision for intricate designs, and users may need extra tools for detailed work. Overall, the Total Seduction Eyeshadow Stick is an excellent choice for makeup enthusiasts who value high-quality, fuss-free products that deliver stunning results. Whether for a quick swipe of color or a show-stopping eye look, this eyeshadow stick is a worthy investment.
faceoff_positive.headline: Total Seduction Eyeshadow Review

faceoff_negative.comments: I'm a sucker for glittery shadows. I've been hugely into Korean makeup which uses glitters and shimmer frequently. I like a glittery shadow with a neutral base for everyday use. This shadow is a good option but it's not the best. The shadow base is too light to use all over the lid, on my complexion it looks too white. I have found that using it on the inner corner looks great but I'd like it if I could wear it all over the lid. I think the shade just isn't right for me. The glitter does last on my lids a while but it does fade by the end of the day so using a primer is essential. I like that it's a stick so it's great for travel. I don't think I would purchase it for the price unless I found a really great shade. I received this shadow stick for free to review.
faceoff_negative.headline: Good but not a holy grail
